Burrock would have smiled if his worm form allowed him to.

Burrock: I heard that! HERE I AM!

He transformed while digging up, which made the ground fly up in the 
air around him. Immediately, he started attacking with his four 
tendrils, trying to knock something off the base, and fired many small 
spikes from his left fist.

Burrock: Let them taste my fury!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> SS reaches the Maxi base.
> 
> SS:  Right here.
> 
> He breaths fire on the shield.
> 
> --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Burrock sent Shadow Star a message.
> > 
> > Burrock: Hey, Handbag-face, where are we supposed to
> > meet up? Do we go 
> > in and wreck or what?
> > 
> > He was still burrowing and was starting to get
> > bored. His pod had 
> > definitely not been a good thing to pass his boredom
> > on.
